title: P22/IHOF New Releases May 2005
content:
For Immediate Release:   
Buffalo, NY April 29, 2005   
   
P22/ International House of Fonts announces the release of 2 new fonts, Kilkenny and St.G Schrift, from 2 new IHOF designers, Colin Kahn and Paul Hunt.   
   
St. G Schrift is a font based on the type designs of German poet Stefan George. This sans-serif face features a few variations found in books published by George in Berlin. P22 St. G Schrift One
author: jimy
